channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Pivotal Spring Data REST and Spring Boot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Pivotal Spring Data REST and Spring Boot

item.title: CVE-2017-8046|2024-08-05T16:19:29.628Z -- pivotal -- pivotal%20spring%20data%20rest%20and%20spring%20boot
item.description: Malicious PATCH requests submitted to servers using Spring Data REST versions prior to 2.6.9 (Ingalls SR9), versions prior to 3.0.1 (Kay SR1) and Spring Boot versions prior to 1.5.9, 2.0 M6 can use specially crafted JSON data to run arbitrary Java code.
